title: Smart Data Models - PhaseTapChangerTablePoint
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Describes each tap step in the phase tap changer tabular curve.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be PhaseTapChangerTablePoint

PhaseTapChangerTable.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The table of this point. Default: None

angle.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The angle difference in degrees. Default: 0.0
